document_data.name: Everwatch Knights
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Everwatch Knights''' were an order of dedicated bodyguards affiliated with the [[church of Helm]] active around [[1369 DR]].

Temples of [[Helm]] hired them out to others in order to generate revenue.<ref>
